title: Interpretation of a dream about quarreling with the husband’s mother

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about quarreling with her husband’s mother is based on a woman’s relationship with her husband’s mother, and this vision makes girls feel anxious when there are some tense relationships with their husband’s mother, so they cannot benefit from them. A girl’s relationship with her husband’s mother is considered one of the most difficult relationships that require a woman to be intelligent to be able to deal with it. With her, and when she sees this dream in a dream, the reason is often that the relationship between the girl and her husband’s mother is tense, so the girl sees this vision. Interpretation of the dream of quarreling with the husband’s mother, through the site Various. We will learn about the interpretation of the dream of quarreling with the husband’s mother, and the most important person who spoke in interpreting this vision is Imam Ibn Sirin, who said that this dream indicates that the three girls are comforted by their problems. And the difficulties that she faces in her life. The apparent meaning of this vision may contain some problems, but most of the meanings that this vision indicates are good meanings, and there are also some bad meanings that this vision carries, but often this meaning has nothing to do with the vision of the wife. Umm. When a married woman sees herself quarreling with her husband’s mother, this means that there are some mistakes in her marital life and she must review herself and get rid of them in order to live a normal life. When she sees her husband’s mother in a dream and quarrels with her dead wife, this means that the wife is going through a difficult psychological stage and will recover from it. God willing, she must try to reach it. Interpretation of a man’s quarrel with his wife’s mother. From the interpretation of a dream of a quarrel with his wife’s mother or husband: When a man sees himself quarreling with his wife’s mother, this indicates that he loves his wife deeply and that there is stability in their marital life and they must maintain it. He - She. Seeing a woman arguing with her husband’s mother in a dream means that there are some problems that she is going through, and she is trying to deal with those problems and stay away from the things that cause her misfortunes in her life. Interpretation of seeing problems between spouses in a dream After interpreting the dream of fighting with the husband’s mother, There are some people who see a quarrel between couples in a dream, and this indicates the great pressure that this person is going through, whether he is a man or a woman, and that person may be single. When a husband sees his wife in a dream and she is suffering from some problems, this means that she is in In reality, she is going through a stage of fear, tension, and anxiety, and she needs a stage of psychological calm, and the husband must help her with that. When a married woman sees that her husband is going through problems in a dream, this means that he is a man suffering from some financial crises and that he has put intense pressure on the girl to help him overcome these problems. Stage.Interpretation of the dream of a man who is angry with his wifeAfter interpreting the dream of a quarrel with the mother-in-law, we talk about the man’s anger with his wife, and this indicates that the husband and wife are living a happy life and they must stop the trees and problems that always exist between them. When you see husbands and wives in a dream, each of them is angry More than the other, it means that there is a relationship of great trust and that they are living a happy and fulfilling life

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about urine according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about urine: Seeing urine is one of the visions in which there is a difference of opinion among jurists, and urine in more detail and explanation. We also explain the details that negatively and positively affect the context of the dream. Seeing urination indicates recovery and relief from worries and difficulties, and urination is beneficial for the poor, the traveler, and the captive, but not It is beneficial for anyone who is a judge or a worker, and it is also abhorrent. For a merchant, it is interpreted as scarcity, loss, lack of profit, and high prices. Whoever sees someone urinating, and is worried, this indicates comfort and assurance, and urinating with a specific person indicates the existence of an affinity, partnership, or business, and mixing urine with a specific person shows interference. Intermittent urination indicates the presence of an affinity, partnership, or business. Ibn Sirin suggests that you spend a sum of money and keep some of it. Interpretation of a dream about urine by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that urine indicates suspicious money and touches corrupt paths that corrupt a person and keep him away from the path and honesty. It also expresses one who spends money on reprehensible deeds, and one of the symbols of urine is also that it indicates Procreation. And the length of lineage, offspring, and growth of luggage. And whoever sees that he is urinating in a place other than his own home or in a foreign home, this indicates lineage and marriage or marriage from that house if it is known for being forbidden and inferior. But urinating is better than retaining urine. Imprisonment for someone who memorizes zakat and does not give charity. It indicates the man’s anxiety, distress, and anger towards his wife, and whoever urinates in a bowl, dish, or bottle, this indicates the woman’s marriage and intercourse with her. Interpretation of a dream about urine for a single woman: Seeing urine symbolizes getting out of crises and adversity, and reassurance and psychological comfort, and if the urine is abundant, it indicates However, the money was paid for the wedding or to prepare the marital home. But if you see that she is holding the urine, this shows tension, excessive anxiety, and fear for her future. However, if she urinates on herself, she may fear that something will be revealed or revealed, and if she urinates on herself in front of her. People may find themselves in an embarrassing situation that embarrasses them. Urinating on clothes indicates an urgent need to satisfy a need or insistence on obtaining a condition. Urinating on the bed indicates marriage in the near future, and urinating in the bathroom means escaping what worries her and achieving comfort and tranquility. Interpretation of a dream about urine For a married woman, seeing urine indicates the disappearance of worries and anxiety and salvation from adversity, and whoever sees that he is urinating and relieving himself in the bathroom, this symbolizes psychological comfort and reassurance, and if the urination is on the ground, this indicates a bad act. , corrupt work and huge losses. And whoever sees that she is urinating on the bed, this indicates pregnancy if she deserves it, but if she urinates on herself, this expresses the money she is hiding and spending on herself, and if she urinates on herself in front of people, this indicates. Modesty and doing things that hurt the feelings and make them feel ashamed. If he sees that he is playing with urine and touching it, this indicates suspicious money, and if he sees that he is drinking urine, this is forbidden money, and the foul smell of urine indicates the difficulty of life and many disputes. And problems at home. Interpretation of a dream about urine for a pregnant woman: Seeing urine expresses her excessive worries and problems in life.

title: Interpretation of applying henna on the hand in a dream

preview.html: The dream of applying henna in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man. Either dyeing the hair with henna, or applying henna to the man’s hand or foot, according to Ibn Sirin. Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of henna in a dream. Henna in a dream indicates marriage to others as a married woman, and work appears to the married man. It is the adornment of the world, and the adornment of children and money, even if its color is not constant. Watching the application of henna on the hand appears. For a married woman, this indicates her husband’s love for her. For an unmarried woman This indicates her marriage, and for a man it means his work tool. Interpretation of seeing henna on the hands in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is putting henna on her hand, then the dream indicates the happiness that will come. If a single woman sees in her dream that she is putting henna on her hand, then the dream It indicates that she will be free of worries and problems. Applying henna on the hand in a dream indicates positive changes in her life. Henna inscription in a dream for an unmarried woman on the tips of the fingers. The dream is a sign of good morals and adherence to religion and Sunnah. Interpretation of henna on the feet in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl if she sees an inscription Henna on her hand and foot in a dream, then the dream indicates the proximity of a relationship and a happy life. If an unmarried woman sees a henna inscription in a dream, if it is on a man, then the vision indicates a relationship with her husband, which will bring her problems and make her regret the decision. Interpretation of henna on the right hand in a dream. Seeing henna In a dream, it means happiness, pleasure, and the arrival of good news. Henna in a dream is a sign of pleasure and happiness. Seeing henna on the right hand in a dream is a sign of the arrival of goodness. Seeing the application of henna in a dream indicates that the dreamer is an ordinary person who is on the right path and God will grant him goodness, profit, and ample living. The unmarried woman who You see henna engraving on your right hand in a dream. The vision indicates engagement and marriage, God willing. Interpretation of applying henna on the left hand in a dream. Applying henna on the left hand in a dream is an unpleasant dream and indicates bad luck, and the vision is a sign of losing money. Putting henna on the left hand in a dream is an unpleasant dream and indicates bad luck, and the vision is a sign of losing money. The left hand in a dream is a sign of distress and entering into financial problems and material poverty. Interpretation of henna on the hand in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees henna applied to her hand or foot, the vision indicates that childbirth will be easy. A pregnant woman who sees henna on her hand and a man in a dream shows love Her husband for her. A pregnant woman who sees her hair dyed with henna in a dream indicates the birth of a male fetus. Removing henna in a dream from the hand or hair. The vision indicates the presence of problems in the dreamer’s life. Seeing henna removed in a dream means that you will face problems during childbirth. Interpretation of henna on the hand in a dream for a married woman. Seeing henna on the hand Or the body in a dream for a married woman indicates the arrival of good deeds and sustenance

title: Interpretation of a dream about taking revenge on a lover in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s revenge in a dream. In the following lines, we will learn the interpretation of a dream about a lover’s revenge in a dream according to what was stated in the books of scholars, not personal interpretations and other details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s revenge in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s revenge in a dream. We did not find clear explanations to see this except that seeing Someone takes revenge on you, which may lead to committing sins, and you must repent, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees revenge against the enemy, this may indicate weakness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a single girl sees that she is taking revenge on a man, this could lead to weakness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about revenge. For the dead in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about taking revenge for the dead in a dream. We did not find clear meanings to see this, but revenge could be a sign of falling into disobedience and sins, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees taking revenge on someone in a dream, this may be a sign of the dreamer’s weakness, and God knows the unseen. And in the event that he sees The dreamer takes revenge on others, it may be a reference to the enemies surrounding him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a thief chasing me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a thief chasing me in a dream. It could be that seeing a thief chasing me and running away is a sign of overcoming some difficult stages, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a married man, the fear of Thieves can lead to anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees a thief, this may mean that he will get rid of distress, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone stealing my belongings in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone stealing my things in a dream. Stealing can indicate evil people, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If the dreamer sees someone stealing, he may turn to deception, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees someone stealing, it may be evidence of trouble, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees someone stealing, he can express difficulties. That he faces, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about someone exploiting me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone exploiting me in a dream. We did not find clear explanations to see that. However, seeing someone lying to me can lead to wonderful opportunities, and God knows best. When a married man sees someone lying to me, he can express his frustration and be God is higher and more knowledgeable. A false vision can also indicate trouble, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a threat from a familiar person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a threat from a familiar person in a dream could be a reference to marriage, and God knows the unseen. If a single young man sees the threat from a familiar face, it can lead to To marriage, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees a threat from a well-known person, this may indicate marriage, and God knows best. While the threat may express anxiety, God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about someone threatening me with a scandal in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone threatening me with a scandal in a dream could be a sign A warning to stop sinning, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When the dreamer sees someone threatening him, he warns him of sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees someone threatening her, this indicates that he is warning her of sins.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a grape tree

preview.html: In this article, we will provide a comprehensive interpretation of the vision in the case of a single woman, a man, a young man, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, and we will also learn about the opinion of the interpreters on this vision. Interpretation of a dream about a grape tree in a dream for a single girl Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream eating from a grape tree. A promising vision and its association with goodness as soon as possible. As for seeing her eating black grapes in a dream, this means her marriage to a young man. The vision of grapes in a dream for an unmarried girl differs according to the color, and white grapes indicate her marriage to a sheikh. Whether she sees green grapes, this means her association with a prestigious man and status. Red grapes in a dream for an unmarried girl, means her relationship with a person who will marry her. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream trying to pick grapes but she cannot. Evidence of many problems she is exposed to. Grapes in general in a dream are a cure for illness, and mean a lot of good. Dreaming of black grapes in a dream for a single girl by following a simple diet. Whether he sees green grapes, this means that he will soon reach a prestigious position. See also: Dreaming of eating grapes Interpretation of seeing a grape tree in a dream for a woman Married Seeing a married woman in a dream eating from a grape tree is an unpleasant dream. It indicates many problems and obstacles in her married life, but after a long patience she reached a solution that makes her happy. Whether the auspicious vision is to see black grapes in a dream, this is evidence of the stability of her married life. Seeing a married woman with green grapes in a dream is evidence of abundant nutrition. Red grapes in a married woman's dream mean her husband's intense love for her and his attachment to her. As for white grapes in a married woman's dream, it is good news that she will become pregnant soon. Picking grapes with difficulty in a dream for a married woman indicates difficulties and obstacles. Grapes in a dream for a married woman or good offspring or a lot of money, also indicates that this woman will enjoy the pleasures of the world. The grape tree in a married woman's dream is good news about recovery from an illness and good news that she will become pregnant soon. For a married woman to see black grapes in a dream and eat them is evidence that she enjoys a stable married life with her husband. As for green grapes in a married woman's dream, this indicates an abundance of money and livelihood. Interpretation of seeing a grape tree in a dream in a man's dream and its meaning Seeing a man in a dream a grape tree is evidence of The fair wife. When a man sees grape juice in a dream, this indicates his promotion and winning a prestigious position. Grapes and figs in a married man’s dream indicate strength and status. Seeing a married man in a dream with grape juice is evidence of an abundance of sustenance and money. Seeing a married man in a dream pressing grapes to make juice and then wine. Proof of expenses and money from a forbidden source. Seeing a married man in a dream eating red grapes is a promising vision to obtain limited benefit. But if he sees in his dream that the grapes he is eating are fat, this is good news that life will increase after hardship. A married man eats grapes in a dream with difficulty and without pleasure. The evidence that this man will face

Seeing a man in a dream of a grape tree is evidence of a fair wife. When a man sees grape juice in a dream, this indicates his promotion and winning a prestigious position. Grapes Figs in a married man’s dream indicate power and status. Seeing a married man in a dream with grape juice is evidence of an abundance of food and money. Seeing a married man in a dream pressing grapes to make juice and then wine. Proof of expenses and money from a forbidden source. Seeing a married man in a dream eating grapes. Red is a promising vision for obtaining limited benefit. But if he sees in his dream that the grapes he is eating are fat, this is good news that he will live longer after hardship. A married man eats grapes in a dream with difficulty and without pleasure. The evidence is that this man will face

title: The interpretation of seeing parents and relatives in a dream completes the correct interpretations

preview.html: Let us get to know you. The interpretation of seeing family and relatives in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Some may mistakenly believe that the field of dream interpretation is a modern human science, but the truth is that human interest in interpreting dreams and knowing their meaning began in ancient times, as the Sumerian civilization was the first human culture to be interested. In interpreting dreams and knowing their meaning, I also believe that the ancient Greeks believed that dreams are a sacred message from the gods who sent the night to the human mind to put a certain idea in his head that portends the appearance of goodness or warns him. Of the bad things that may happen to him. Based on the importance of interpreting dreams and knowing the meanings of their symbols and signs, we present to you the interpretation of seeing parents and relatives in a dream according to the Muslim translator Ibn Sirin from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of seeing family and relatives in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that a person seeing his relatives in the house in... A dream is one of the visions whose interpretations vary depending on several factors, including how close the dreamer is to his relatives, what relationship he has with them, where they are in the house in particular, and what their condition was like when they were in the house, whether they were sitting, talking, or arguing. Or they eat, or they sit in silence. Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees his relatives in a dream in his bedroom indicates the interference of these relatives in matters that do not concern them in the affairs of his private home. Whereas when the relatives are in a position that allows them to receive visitors in the event that the person with the insight is happy This is an indication that he will survive a disaster or hardship that occurred during this period thanks to the help of one of his relatives, but when the situation is not the case. Satisfying the insight and making him sad, this indicates that one of his relatives will be the cause of a problem or crisis that will happen to him, and God knows best. Also, in the presence of relatives at home and sitting without speaking in complete silence, this is an indication that the person with the insight will have to prove his innocence in something in front of the entire family. For the relatives sitting, looking with insight as they watch his life, all betting on his failure and inability to achieve his ambitions, is a sign that he will fail in their hopes and be very successful in his career. Interpretation of a dream about relatives in our house When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is receiving his relatives and bringing them into his house, This is evidence of the dreamer’s generosity, generosity, and good morals, and providing food to relatives indicates the arrival of abundant sustenance and kindness to the dreamer. When relatives gather in the dreamer’s house to eat, the vision portends goodness if this is done in a large part of the house such as the drawing room or food preparation areas such as the kitchen. While the vision portends sadness and grief if the dreamer sees in his sleep that they are eating food in his bedroom or bathroom. And when the dreamer sees that his relatives are sitting and talking to each other in his house, this is an indication that he is planning something important in his life and that he will succeed in implementing it, God willing. . Relatives talk about other people’s affairs and make them talk and gossip. This indicates that the visionary person will fail in his plans. Also, when meeting with relatives,

title: I dreamed that I was eating animal dung in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I ate animal dung in a dream, and the interpretation of a dream about food varies from one person to another, so we present the scholars’ interpretation regarding that I dreamed that I ate animal dung in a dream. I dreamed that I was eating animal dung in a dream. I dreamed that I was eating animal dung in a dream, which may indicate enmity. And God knows the unseen. When you see yourself eating cow dung, this may indicate bad luck, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself eating cat dung, this may lead to a cheerful woman, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees himself eating dog dung, this may indicate a bad person, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was eating Bird droppings in a dreamI dreamed that I was eating bird droppings in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing bird droppings in a dream can be a sign of food, and God knows the unseen. Seeing bird droppings can also represent good news, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees bird droppings in a dream, this indicates stability, and God knows best. I dreamed that I ate Coconut in a dream: I dreamed that I ate a coconut in a dream, which could lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees in a dream eating a coconut, perhaps this indicates marriage, and God knows everything that no one has seen. If a married woman is seen eating a coconut in a dream, This may represent sustenance, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream eating coconuts, this may indicate goodness and profit, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating garlic in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating garlic in a dream could indicate repentance from sins, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself eating garlic It may be good and nourishing, and God knows best. While many scholars saw that eating raw garlic may be evidence of dieting and forbidding money, God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating sugar cane in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating sugar cane in a dream could be a sign of achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself eating reeds in a dream, this may be evidence of achieving goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself eating reeds in a dream, this may be a sign of his freedom from worry and sadness, and God knows the unseen. If a pregnant woman is seen eating reeds, she may This indicates goodness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating food with quarrels in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about food with quarrels in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing someone preparing food with a discussion in a dream can be a sign of solving problems, and God knows best, where peace can be expressed. With him, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen preparing food with someone with whom he is quarreling, this may lead to reconciliation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about taking a pill in a dream Interpretation of a dream about taking a pill in a dream could be a sign of getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. Where if one girl sees In a dream, she is eating a pill, this may be evidence that she is relieving stress, and God knows the unseen.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a sister marrying Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about his sister’s wedding. Some may see that this vision is not worthy of praise given the beliefs that they know that marriage indicates death in reality, and then the dreamer feels anxiety and extreme fear for his sister, but this vision is one of the praiseworthy and promising visions for the dreamer or sister, and the interpretation of this vision has been taken by many From the interpreters, they interpreted according to the events of the vision and the social status of the pioneer and how he saw the condition of his sister who got married in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about his sister’s wedding. Dreaming about marrying a sister in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve everything he wants and all his goals later, but if in reality there are some differences between the dreamer And his sister, this vision portends reconciliation between them. If the dreamer sees his sister getting married in a dream, the vision indicates that the dreamer will hear some happy news or success that the fortuneteller will achieve, and the vision can sometimes indicate that the dreamer is young enough that he will do so. Marrying the girl he loves and wants. Interpretation of a dream about a sister’s marriage from Ibn Sirin. A dream about a sister’s marriage in a girl’s dream indicates that the dreamer’s sister will gain happiness and joy in the coming days and that the dream will come true and she will marry a good and righteous man. Seeing a sister’s wedding in a dream indicates that she is a loyal girl. She is religious and virtuous and possesses many good qualities other than her morals. When a young man sees in a dream that his sister is getting married and attends her wedding, and the wedding was very large, the vision shows that the dreamer’s sister is marrying a very wealthy man, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a sister marrying an unmarried woman: The dreamer saw in a dream that her sister was getting married and even committed some sins and actions that angered God. The vision indicates that she will stop these actions and get rid of them, and God will lead her to repentance. And return to him. The marriage of an older sister in an unmarried woman’s dream is one of the unfortunate visions that indicate that the dreamer will commit some sins or fall into an act of deception, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing my married sister’s wedding in a dream with an unmarried woman If the girl sees her married sister getting married again In a dream, it means that the girl will achieve her dreams and goals in life and achieve everything she wants. When an unmarried girl sees that her married sister is marrying someone she does not know, this vision is reprehensible and does not bode well and may indicate the approaching death of her brothers. If the girl sees that her sister She marries someone she knows in a dream and does not feel love and a relationship. The vision indicates that her sister’s marital life has crises and problems, and these differences may lead to divorce. Seeing a married sister’s wedding in a dream for a girl who has never been married and wearing a wedding dress. The vision indicates that her sister is going through With anxiety and problems during this time. Interpretation of a dream about a married sister’s wedding: If a married woman sees that her sister is getting married in a dream, this vision indicates that the worries and problems in her life will go away and her worries will go away in the coming days, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. When a woman sees that her sister is getting married in a dream, This vision indicates the success of her marriage

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of the appearance of iron in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of iron in a dream: There are many visions that occupy the minds of many people, as the dreamer finds himself dreaming of something he did not expect, and these dreams are many, including a dream about iron in a dream, which exists in many forms, including ironing clothes or ironing hair, and through this article we will learn about it in detail. Iron in a dream Seeing iron in a dream has a bad effect on the dream, as we find that in reality it causes harm to people, but there are many places that express goodness, so everyone turns to the interpretation of the iron dream to understand these meanings in depth. The interpretation of the dream varies depending on the interpretation, so there is no There is one interpretation for the fortuneteller, but it depends largely on his psychological state. When he dreams that he is ironing clothes, this indicates the presence of psychological comfort in his life and his freedom from any distress that bothers him terribly. If a woman dreams that she was burned while ironing, this indicates the presence of a disease that is bothering her in her life. And it causes her great sadness that she cannot bear. If the dreamer sees iron in his dream, this means that he will be affected by words that severely harm himself. Hot iron in a dream This dream has a tinge of good and evil at the same time in which we find that it shows the dreamer’s extreme intelligence, but it does not He uses it well in his life when he faces many problems that he cannot control properly. It can indicate problems at work and home that cause great sadness to the pioneer. An indication of unfair competition that greatly exhausts the dreamer and angers him. Exposure to an illness that tires him out and undermines his comfort. Interpretation of a dream Seeing an iron in a dream by Ibn Sirin: We find that our great scholar Ibn Sirin has many interpretations of this vision, such as: If a woman sees that clothes have burned while ironing, this indicates her interest in an important matter at work, which makes her think about it without stopping. If a person dreams of a cold iron in His dream, this clearly indicates the loss of his authority in his home in front of everyone. Seeing iron in a dream is a source of great anxiety that dominates the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. There are different interpretations that Imam Al-Nabulsi explained to us, which are: If the dreamer sees that his hand is burned by an iron, this is a sign of the presence of Problems and misfortunes in his life. This dream can also be a source of comfort for its owner in life. If the dreamer burns his clothes with an iron during the dream, this indicates his fierce competition with others. Interpretation of seeing Ibn Shaheen ironing in a dream. Seeing this dream shows that the dreamer is stingy and he is spending this money In a place that does not please God. It can indicate that this person will travel in the near future. When a pregnant woman dreams of this vision, it is a sign of the ease of childbirth for her. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream by Miller There are many important interpretations listed in Miller’s Encyclopedia, Including: When a woman dreams that she is ironing clothes, this is a sign of her great comfort and her wonderful and organized work. If the dreamer irons clothes with an iron, this indicates the presence of someone who competes with him and makes him sad in his work. If a woman dreams that she is ironing clothes with

title: What did Al-Nabulsi say in interpreting a dream about fire?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fire in a dream Many people are exposed to this type of dream, although it is disturbing because of the fire and the panic it causes, but fire has different uses and certainly the interpretation of a dream about fire in a dream differs from one person to another because it affects the place and shape of the fire. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing fire in a dream Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing fire can express something and its opposite, as it indicates reward because it leads to darkness and can indicate punishment as it can express hell, and from it indicates the approach of good news or the coming of evil. Or danger. Al-Nabulsi believes that lighting a fire symbolizes conflicts or wars between people over worldly matters, while extinguishing a fire indicates calm and strengthening relationships with distinguished personalities. Al-Nabulsi believes that fire expresses the light of knowledge and the desire for different knowledge. As for burning a house, it is a sign that the dreamer is not satisfied with his situation and wants to change many things in the house. Seeing fire coming out of the dreamer's hand indicates that he is unjust and corrupt and does not follow God in his work or that he eats from illegitimate earnings and does not care about the source of money and does not investigate it. Whoever dreams of eating fire, this indicates that the dreamer eats forbidden things, especially the money of an orphan. Al-Nabulsi believes that the smoke rising from a fire in a dream indicates the approach of major tribulations and calamities. What does fire mean in general? Fire is one of God's creatures that mocks man, and in His Almighty saying (And I created the jinn from my dispersion) it emanates from a small spark. There are many uses for fire, including good and evil, as it protects us from the cold and is used to cook food and light roads in the dark, but fire can be a disaster due to the fire and what results from it From panic like the site will explain. Different vision of lighting a fire to light the roads and guide them, if the seer reaches his need, the vision indicates the knowledge that will benefit him or the good company that will help him, but if it burns what happened, this means an innovation that the seer invents and exaggerates in its multiplication. And to interpret the dream of fire in a dream, whoever sees a fire in its stove like ovens and the like, it is a gift, benefit and good. And whoever dreams that he lit a fire in the door of the Sultan, this is evidence of his acquisition of power and prestige, and whoever leaves his house, the fire indicates his profession. The vision of lighting a fire in the tops of the mountains expresses that God Almighty will meet his needs and bring him closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of the dream of fire in a dream The interpretation of the dream of fire in a dream varies according to the time. Whoever sees it lit in the summer shows the spread of unrest among people, and whoever sees it burning in the winter is a search for a livelihood, especially buying gold. As for his vision of lighting it at dawn, it is a new idea that he will present and benefit from, but its fuel at noon indicates a behavior different from the style of society. Seeing a fire burning at the time of Maghrib and Isha It is a temptation that spreads among people, unless the dreamer is one of the righteous, in which case this indicates that he is working to collect. Whoever sees that the fire in the oven has been extinguished with water or air, this indicates poverty, while extinguishing the fire in a dream indicates extinguishing the temptation at the hands of God.

And to interpret the dream of fire in a dream, whoever sees a fire in its stove like ovens and the like, it is a gift, benefit and good. And whoever dreams that he lit a fire in the door of the Sultan, this is evidence of his acquisition of power and prestige, and whoever leaves his house, the fire indicates his profession. The vision of lighting a fire in the tops of the mountains expresses that God Almighty will meet his needs and bring him closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of the dream of fire in a dream The interpretation of the dream of fire in a dream varies according to the time. Whoever sees it lit in the summer shows the spread of unrest among people, and whoever sees it burning in the winter is a search for a livelihood, especially buying gold. As for his vision of lighting it at dawn, it is a new idea that he will present and benefit from, but its fuel at noon indicates a behavior different from the style of society. Seeing a fire burning at the time of Maghrib and Isha It is a temptation that spreads among people, unless the dreamer is one of the righteous, in which case this indicates that he is working to collect. Whoever sees that the fire in the oven has been extinguished with water or air, this indicates poverty, while extinguishing the fire in a dream indicates extinguishing the temptation at the hands of God.
